content: --वासस् {%<ab>a.</ab>%} {1} ill-dressed. {2} naked. {%--<ab>m.</ab>%} <ab>N.</ab> of a very irascible saint or Ṛṣi, son of Atri and Anasūyā. (He was very hard to please, and he cursed many a male and female to suffer misery and degradation. His anger, like that of Jamadagni, has become almost proverbial).
